evidence.claim: DEIN utilizes AWS services for cloud infrastructure.
The platform is HIPAA compliant, ensuring secure handling of health data.
Integration with FHIR for health data exchange is supported.
Kafka is used for real-time data streaming in health platform services.
They provide integration with traditional EHR systems using HL7 standards.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 transaction usage or clearinghouse services found on site.
